Name: Nelis
Review Text: A really lovely evening. The restaurant is nicely laid out with lots of light. You can sit outside of the Dutch weather allows. The service is excellent with two friendly waitresses who were faultless. The menu is varied with some ‚Ä¶

Review Text: Good food, very friendly waitress, bit expensive.
